name: sigma_list_workbooks
description: List all Sigma Computing workbooks

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of workbooks to return (default: 50, max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

name: sigma_get_workbook
description: Get detailed information about a specific workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the workbook

name: sigma_create_workbook
description: Create a new Sigma Computing workbook

arguments.name: name
arguments.desc: Name of the workbook

arguments.name: description
arguments.desc: Description of the workbook

arguments.name: folder_id
arguments.desc: ID of the folder to create workbook in

name: sigma_export_workbook
description: Export from Sigma workbook. Three modes: (1) Full workbook - omit element_id/page_id, (2) Single page - use page_id, (3) Element data - use element_id. Returns queryId for sigma_download_export.

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the workbook (required)

arguments.name: element_id
arguments.desc: Element ID for data export (supports all formats)

arguments.name: page_id
arguments.desc: Page ID for single page export (pdf, png, xlsx only)

arguments.name: format_type
arguments.desc: Export format: pdf, png, xlsx (all modes) or csv, json, jsonl (element only). Default: pdf

arguments.name: pdf_layout
arguments.desc: PDF orientation: portrait or landscape (default: landscape)

arguments.name: png_width
arguments.desc: PNG width in pixels

arguments.name: png_height
arguments.desc: PNG height in pixels

arguments.name: row_limit
arguments.desc: Max rows (element exports only, up to 1M)

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Starting row for batched exports (element only)

name: sigma_download_export
description: Download an exported file using the queryId from sigma_export_workbook. The export must be ready before downloading.

arguments.name: query_id
arguments.desc: Query ID returned from sigma_export_workbook

name: sigma_list_workbook_tags
description: Get tags for a specific workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

name: sigma_list_workbook_pages
description: List all pages contained within a specified workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

arguments.name: tag
arguments.desc: Tag name to retrieve pages from version-tagged workbooks

arguments.name: bookmark_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the bookmark to retrieve pages from saved view

name: sigma_list_page_elements
description: List all elements from a specific page within a workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: page_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook page

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

arguments.name: tag
arguments.desc: Tag name to retrieve elements from version-tagged workbooks

arguments.name: bookmark_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the bookmark to retrieve elements from saved view

name: sigma_get_element_query
description: Get the SQL query associated with a specific element in a workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: element_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook element

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

name: sigma_get_element_lineage
description: Get the lineage and dependencies of a specific workbook element

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: element_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook element (must be a data element like table, pivot table, or visualization)

name: sigma_list_element_columns
description: List columns associated with a specific element within a workbook

arguments.name: workbook_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook

arguments.name: element_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the workbook element

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

name: sigma_list_datasets
description: List all Sigma Computing datasets

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of datasets to return

name: sigma_get_dataset
description: Get detailed information about a specific dataset

arguments.name: dataset_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the dataset

name: sigma_materialize_dataset
description: Trigger materialization of a dataset in the cloud data warehouse

arguments.name: dataset_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the dataset

arguments.name: schedule
arguments.desc: Materialization schedule

name: sigma_list_members
description: List all organization members (paginated)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of members to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token from nextPage in previous response

arguments.name: search
arguments.desc: Search filter for members (URL encode @ as %40 for emails)

arguments.name: includeArchived
arguments.desc: Include archived users in results

arguments.name: includeInactive
arguments.desc: Include inactive users in results

name: sigma_get_member
description: Get detailed information about a specific organization member by ID

arguments.name: member_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the member

name: sigma_create_member
description: Create a new member in the organization

arguments.name: email
arguments.desc: Email address of the new member

arguments.name: first_name
arguments.desc: First name of the member

arguments.name: last_name
arguments.desc: Last name of the member

arguments.name: account_type
arguments.desc: Account type for the member (viewer, creator, admin)

name: sigma_list_member_teams
description: List all teams for a specific organization member

arguments.name: member_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier for the member

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of teams to return per page (max: 1000)

arguments.name: page
arguments.desc: Page token from nextPage in previous response

name: sigma_list_teams
description: List all teams in the organization

name: sigma_list_account_types
description: List all account types available in the organization

arguments.name: page_size
arguments.desc: Number of results to return per page (max: 1000, default: 50)

arguments.name: page_token
arguments.desc: Page token for pagination

name: sigma_get_account_type_permissions
description: Get all feature permissions for a specific account type

arguments.name: account_type_id
arguments.desc: Unique identifier of the account type
